name: TheAtlantic
text: “It all still felt like a game. She wasn’t plotting to help a convicted murderer escape from prison. She was just figuring out solutions to new problems.” @MooneyMichaelJ on the dog-crate prison break: https://t.co/A4Wazj2T7U

name: TheAtlantic
text:
Oracle is set to become TikTok’s U.S. partner in a deal that aims to satisfy concerns about the app's data security.

In July, @MichaelSchuman asked: Why is America so afraid of a goofy video app for teens? https://t.co/B1Ci1lwg71

name: TheAtlantic
text: More than 30 wildfires are currently burning in the state of Oregon. Over the past week, dry weather and strong winds drove the flames into several towns and neighborhoods, leaving some communities utterly destroyed. Images via @theAtlPhoto: https://t.co/xxWi3LqNL9 https://t.co/8t58XDlsyn
